Episodes.Title: I Love You and Auto Memory Dolls
Episodes.Director: Haruka Fujita, Taichi Ishidate, Shinpei Sawa
Episodes.Actors: Yui Ishikawa, Takehito Koyasu, Daisuke Namikawa
Episodes.Plot: Violet is a soldier in the Leidenschaftlich Army who served under Major Gilbert Bougainvillea, who she was utterly devoted to. However, Violet is injured after a mission which resulted in the loss of her arms, requiring them to be...

Episodes.Title: Never Coming Back
Episodes.Actors: Yui Ishikawa, Takehito Koyasu, Daisuke Namikawa
Episodes.Plot: Violet joins the ghostwriting department and meets its members: the veteran Cattelya, and the two rookies Erica and Iris. Under Cattelya's direction, Violet begins her training as an Auto Memoir Doll, quickly learning how to use a...

Episodes.Title: May You Be an Exemplary Auto Memory Doll
Episodes.Director: Haruka Fujita, Taichi Ishidate, Noriyuki Kitanohara
Episodes.Writer: Kana Akatsuki, Tatsuhiko Urahata, Reiko Yoshida
Episodes.Actors: Yui Ishikawa, Takehito Koyasu, Daisuke Namikawa
Episodes.Plot: As Cattleya advised, Violet decides to attend an Auto Memoir Doll training school. There, she meets Luculia and they start a friendship.

Episodes.Title: You Won't Be a Tool, But a Person Worthy of That Name
Episodes.Director: Haruka Fujita, Taichi Ishidate, Shinpei Sawa
Episodes.Actors: Yui Ishikawa, Takehito Koyasu, Daisuke Namikawa
Episodes.Plot: Violet and her work companion Iris were called to the hometown where Iris lives and discover the actual reason for her commission.

Episodes.Title: You Write Letters That Bring People Together?
Episodes.Director: Haruka Fujita, Taichi Ishidate, Shinpei Sawa
Episodes.Writer: Kana Akatsuki, Takaaki Suzuki, Reiko Yoshida
Episodes.Actors: Yui Ishikawa, Takehito Koyasu, Hidenobu Kiuchi
Episodes.Plot: After gaining some experience of working as Auto Memories Doll, Violet Evergarden went for her first important commission to a Princess who is having issues of her marriage.

Episodes.Title: Somewhere, Under a Starry Sky
Episodes.Director: Haruka Fujita, Taichi Ishidate, Yoshiji Kigami
Episodes.Writer: Kana Akatsuki, Tatsuhiko Urahata, Reiko Yoshida
Episodes.Actors: Yui Ishikawa, Yûto Uemura, Azusa Tadokoro
Episodes.Plot: Violet travels to the country of Astrea to work with transcribers copying damaged manuscripts. Her partner Leon has a past, not unlike hers.

Episodes.Title: Episode #1.7
Episodes.Director: Haruka Fujita, Taichi Ishidate, Takuya Yamamura
Episodes.Actors: Yui Ishikawa, Takehito Koyasu, Daisuke Namikawa
Episodes.Plot: A playwright with writer's block and a tragic past summons Violet to the country of Genetrix to help him finish a script. They both learn about grief.

Episodes.Title: Episode #1.8
Episodes.Director: Haruka Fujita, Taichi Ishidate, Shinpei Sawa
Episodes.Actors: Yui Ishikawa, Takehito Koyasu, Daisuke Namikawa
Episodes.Plot: As Violet searches for the Major in the present day, she recalls the time she first met him and became the terrifying weapon that turned the tide of the war.

Episodes.Title: Violet Evergarden
Episodes.Director: Haruka Fujita, Taichi Ishidate, Yasuhiro Takemoto
Episodes.Actors: Yui Ishikawa, Takehito Koyasu, Daisuke Namikawa
Episodes.Plot: After realizing that Violet lost Gilbert, she assume her self to be useless but in time she found her existence to be valued by others by accepting the truth of both past and present.

Episodes.Title: Loved Ones Will Always Watch Over You
Episodes.Director: Haruka Fujita, Taichi Ishidate, Taiichi Ogawa
Episodes.Actors: Yui Ishikawa, Aya Endô, Minori Chihara
Episodes.Plot: Violet goes to assist a medically ill woman whose daughter Anne assumes that she is being ignored by her mother. It isn't until later on her life she realizes what she was really doing for her.

Episodes.Title: I Don't Want Anybody Else to Die
Episodes.Director: Haruka Fujita, Taichi Ishidate, Noriyuki Kitanohara
Episodes.Writer: Kana Akatsuki, Tatsuhiko Urahata, Reiko Yoshida
Episodes.Actors: Yui Ishikawa, Takehito Koyasu, Aya Endô
Episodes.Plot: Violet goes to assist a soldier named Aidan of the neighboring country Ctrigal which is in a state of Civil War.

Episodes.Title: Episode #1.12
Episodes.Director: Haruka Fujita, Taichi Ishidate, Shinpei Sawa
Episodes.Writer: Kana Akatsuki, Takaaki Suzuki, Reiko Yoshida
Episodes.Actors: Yui Ishikawa, Takehito Koyasu, Hidenobu Kiuchi
Episodes.Plot: Violet comes to know the rebel anti peace faction don't wants that the peace treaty to get sign so she helps Dietfried to stop the anti peace faction.

Episodes.Title: Auto Memoir Doll and "I Love You"
Episodes.Actors: Yui Ishikawa, Takehito Koyasu, Daisuke Namikawa
Episodes.Plot: After the end of the war Violet tries to write down her feelings in to a letter to Gilbert as it was suggested by her co workers for the air show which was going to held after five years due to the peace achieved between the nations.

Episodes.Title: OVA: Surely, Someday You Will Understand "Love"
Episodes.Director: Haruka Fujita, Taichi Ishidate, Taiichi Ogawa
Episodes.Writer: Kana Akatsuki, Tatsuhiko Urahata, Reiko Yoshida
Episodes.Actors: Yui Ishikawa, Takehito Koyasu, Daisuke Namikawa
Episodes.Plot: A story that takes place in the months between the fourth and fifth episode. Violet answers the request of a certain songstress.
